name: JetPac Hero
description:
Shoot down enemies! Dodge walls! Collect gasoline! Avoid death at ALL costs!

Jetpac Hero is a fun game, (It is also hard.) developed by Infinity Games Indie, which is ran by two people: Lincoln Bibby-Wheeler (Programmer and Artist.) and August Gadbow (Artist).

MUSIC BY: TheFatRat and Tasty Records. Timelapse(Video):

Now time for you to get to know us!

Lincoln Charles Bibby-Wheeler

Favorite Food: The cardboard on the bottom of Twinkies.

Hates: American made manga.

Loves: H02 (or SmartWater!(What's the difference, you ask?(One has electrolytes.(Science!))))

August Sebastian Gadbow

Coming 6/11/16 4:30pm

Check out the full game played by Jupiter Hadley on YouTube!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i2UfdTOJ2Hg
